Room.Name: Darmanian Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Darmanian Way, south of the Sleepy Traveller Inn.
Room.LongDescription: The Sleepy Traveller Inn is a large facility where travellers can come and stay for many nights in Oceancrest without having to pay those outrageous rates charged by some of the fancier inns. The Sleepy Traveller Inn offers many "deals" for people spending a week or even a month in Oceancrest.
